entry.title: SMOG WARNING , Salaberry-de-Valleyfield

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
